results.title: With No New Films, Regal Cinemas Shuts Down Again
results.abstract: Cineworld, the parent company of the second largest chain in the U.S., is closing all its theaters in the country, as studios keep postponing releases and audiences remain reluctant to return to the movies.
results.byline: By Nicole Sperling, Gillian Friedman and Eshe Nelson
